statements: SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT name, description FROM algorithms;
SELECT id, name, author FROM algorithms WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM algorithms WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM algorithms ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM algorithms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, author FROM algorithms WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM algorithms WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM algorithms WHERE description LIKE '%search%';
SELECT id, name, author FROM algorithms ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM authors;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE email='example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM algorithms ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE author_id=1;
SELECT * FROM algorithms WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM algorithms WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT algorithm_name, author_name FROM algorithms INNER JOIN authors ON algorithms.author = authors.author_id;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM algorithms WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM algorithms_metadata;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM algorithms_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name, author FROM algorithms_metadata ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name, description FROM algorithms_metadata WHERE algorithm_name LIKE '%search%';
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name FROM algorithms_metadata WHERE author = 'Jane Smith' AND algorithm_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM algorithms_metadata
SELECT algorithm_name, author FROM algorithms_metadata WHERE algorithm_id = 3
SELECT algorithm_id, description FROM algorithms_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM algorithm_types
SELECT type_name FROM algorithm_types WHERE type_id = 2
SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT id, name, description FROM algorithms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, author FROM algorithms ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM algorithms WHERE name = 'Binary Search';
SELECT name, description FROM algorithms WHERE name LIKE '%tree%';
SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT id, name, author FROM algorithms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM algorithms WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, description, author FROM algorithms ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT a.name AS algorithm_name, c.name AS category_name FROM algorithms a JOIN algorithm_categories ac ON a.id = ac.algorithm_id JOIN categories c ON ac.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT id, name FROM algorithms ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, author FROM algorithms WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, description FROM algorithms WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authors WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM algorithms;
SELECT id, name, author FROM algorithms ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM algorithms WHERE id = 2;
SELECT a.name, c.name AS category FROM algorithms a JOIN algorithm_categories ac ON a.id = ac.algorithm_id JOIN categories c ON ac.category_id = c.id;
SELECT a.name AS algorithm_name, au.name AS author_name FROM algorithms a JOIN algorithm_authors aa ON a.id = aa.algorithm_id JOIN authors au ON aa.author_id = au.id ORDER BY a.name DESC;
